message: Ep 2 @18:55 look how belldandy just clearly and with respect reject a jerk like Aoshima , saying she have keichi ...and now look at this episode how a shithole person named keichi can't reject a juniour when he know this going to hurt belldandy.. i think she should along with urd and skuld should go back to heaven because keichi does not deserve belldandy
